mapper.select: select u.id as u_id,u.avatarUrl as u_avatarUrl,u.nickname as u_nickname, a.id,a.boardId,a.userId,a.title,a.visitCount,a.replyCount,a.likeCount,a.state, a.createTime,a.updateTime from t_article a,t_user u where a.userId=u.id and a.deleteState=0 order by a.createTime desc;

select u.id as u_id,u.avatarUrl as u_avatarUrl,u.nickname as u_nickname, u.gender as u_gender,u.isAdmin as u_isAdmin,u.state as u_state,u.deleteState as u_deleteState, b.id as b_id,b.name as b_name,b.state as b_state,b.deleteState as b_deleteState, a.id,a.boardId,a.userId,a.title,a.content,a.visitCount,a.replyCount,a.likeCount,a.state, a.createTime,a.updateTime from t_article a,t_user u ,forum_db.t_board b where a.userId=u.id and a.boardId=b.id and a.deleteState=0 and a.id=#{id}
